text: 20.23: Mt 25.34; FG 12.2; Ro 8.17; 2 Ko 1.7; VB 1.9Mani ne nzuaim, Zisas ne mbararagiap, khaŋ mani ga nzuai, “Ŋko guigira gu mbɨrga mbɨ khɨnigen mbɨrga. Ŋko mba the nan guva haren pigɨrga, the nan ŋkɨn haren pigɨrga ne, ne na bigeŋ fhuvara. Gu mba ŋanenin pigɨrga gumgi ndi fɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Mba mpirmpirɨganin pigɨrga gumgi, nan Ndia mba gumgi kaŋgiap, ana mbe ndi fegi mpirmpirɨgani ma.”
